data.lyric:
[ti:In My Room (Explicit)]
[ar:Frank Ocean]
[al:In My Room (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]In My Room (Explicit) - Frank Ocean
[00:08.83]Lyrics by：Frank Ocean/Michael Uzowuru
[00:17.66]No sleeper seats that's a mattress
[00:20.99]No sleeper seats that's a mattress
[00:24.13]You ain't stingy split your tablets with me
[00:27.02]You won't flinch when camera's flashing flashing
[00:30.15]Not fake laid back no it's natural
[00:32.97]And I think you made for the life I lead
[00:36.06]I'm not fake patient I don't fake sick
[00:39.22]That kinda coffin don't need lean rest in peace
[00:42.28]Got this lust for life in me
[00:45.38]Horny for the game
[00:48.33]First they kiss then they bite soft
[00:51.28]Then that b***h wanna play it off
[00:54.04]F**k it I'm pretty still in a pit of snakes
[00:55.92]While serpents shake some brand new scales
[00:57.41]I need a new face I'm tired of these weirdos
[00:59.30]Acting familiar took all the rock
[01:00.46]And turned it to pop he think that he Elvis
[01:02.11]And he ungrateful they don't say thank you
[01:03.62]They don't say grace not even for meals not even for millions
[01:06.20]F**k it I'm pretty still look at my deal
[01:08.10]Richard Mille look at my ears flooded with diamonds
[01:10.33]Look at my skills running through blocks like 49ers
[01:12.67]Forty-nine diamonds stuffed in my bracelet
[01:14.15]That cost a whop that cost a whopper
[01:15.64]And it ain't new I had a knot at John Ehret in my locker
[01:18.74]Pretty still it ain't no pretty pill
[01:20.52]It's either real or real
[01:21.77]Real easy on the eyes green like a soccer field
[01:24.71]Skin hot when they tried me like them poppers feel
[01:27.85]Hands shaking norepinephrine levels sky rocket fuel
[01:30.79]Rocket
[01:32.92]Quit being violent with me
[01:36.20]Quit being violent with me
[01:39.09]Quit being violent with me
[01:42.19]You make me violent
[01:44.39]My room my room my room with me
[01:49.19]Every night you were in my room
[01:52.26]My room my room with me
[01:55.08]I guess I can't state my feelings too soon
[01:58.51]I don't know you
[02:01.36]And I can't put no threats in the air
data.trans:
[ti:In My Room (Explicit)]
[ar:Frank Ocean]
[al:In My Room (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.83]//
[00:17.66]这不是商务舱 这是货真价实的头等舱
[00:20.99]这不是商务舱 这是货真价实的头等舱
[00:24.13]你慷慨大方 和我一同共享快乐
[00:27.02]当照相机闪个不停 你丝毫不会退缩
[00:30.15]这不是矫揉造作 这是自然流露
[00:32.97]我认为你成就了我
[00:36.06]我不是假装有耐心 我不会惺惺作态
[00:39.22]不必放纵就能自毁前程 安息吧
[00:42.28]我对人生充满渴望
[00:45.38]对这个圈子充满期待
[00:48.33]他们让你初尝甜头 轻咬你一口
[00:51.28]随后就会翻脸无情 将你狠心抛弃
[00:54.04]我依然小心谨慎
[00:55.92]而别人在耀武扬威 炫耀自己
[00:57.41]我渴望改头换面 我受够这些怪咖
[00:59.30]熟悉的举动 力排众议
[01:00.46]融入流行音乐 他以为自己是猫王
[01:02.11]他忘恩负义 不会对你心存感激
[01:03.62]无论是吃饭 还是面对众人的时候 他们不会认真祈祷
[01:06.20]我依然出色 势在必得
[01:08.10]戴着理查德·米勒的手表 看看我耳朵上镶满钻石的耳钉
[01:10.33]见识一下我的独门绝招 就像49人队一样纵横街区 势不可挡
[01:12.67]我的手镯上镶着49颗钻石
[01:14.15]这可是价值连城
[01:15.64]这不足为奇 衣柜里还留着高中时的领结让我保持初心 
[01:18.74]我依然出色 不需要借助外力
[01:20.52]这一切都是真实的
[01:21.77]怡然自得 我的钞票就像绿茵场一样令人心旷神怡
[01:24.71]他们挑衅我的时候 就像吸入了**一样面红耳赤
[01:27.85]双手颤抖 让自己找回平静 释放我的满腔热血
[01:30.79]一飞冲天
[01:32.92]别对我粗暴无礼
[01:36.20]别对我粗暴无礼
[01:39.09]别对我粗暴无礼
[01:42.19]你让我勃然大怒
[01:44.39]我只想一个人待在房间里
[01:49.19]每天晚上 你都在我的房间里
[01:52.26]我只想一个人待在房间里
[01:55.08]我想我不能过早吐露自己的感觉
[01:58.51]我不了解你
[02:01.36]我不能时刻威胁你
